com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models

Class ExtensionCertificateConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models.ExtensionCertificateConfiguration

  • public class ExtensionCertificateConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Optional. Parameters of the the certificate for encrypting the private configuration data. Supported on WebRole or WorkerRole, but ignored on VmRole.

      • getStoreLocation

        public java.lang.String getStoreLocation()
        Required. Required for certificate declaration. The Windows certificate store location to install the certificate for encryption, if required. Its value has to be 'LocalMachine' if present.
        Returns:
        The StoreLocation value.

      • getStoreName

      • getThumbprintAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String getThumbprintAlgorithm()
        Optional. Optional. The thumbprint algorithm of the certificate for encryption, if required. Its value has to be 'sha1' if present.
        Returns:
        The ThumbprintAlgorithm value.

      • setThumbprintAlgorithm

        public void setThumbprintAlgorithm(java.lang.String thumbprintAlgorithmValue)
        Optional. Optional. The thumbprint algorithm of the certificate for encryption, if required. Its value has to be 'sha1' if present.
        Parameters:
        thumbprintAlgorithmValue - The ThumbprintAlgorithm value.

      • isThumbprintRequired

        public java.lang.Boolean isThumbprintRequired()
        Optional. Optional. Whether thumbprint is required for the certificate for encryption or not. Its value has to be 'true' or 'false' (case-sensitive) if present.
        Returns:
        The ThumbprintRequired value.

      • setThumbprintRequired
